prompt:
Translate natural language sentences into patterns.

ALLOWED_PATTERNS: existence, existenceTwo, response, chainResponse, respondedExistence
ALLOWED_SYMBOLS: Slack, Salesforce, Eventbrite, SurveyMonkey, Amazon S3, Microsoft Teams, ServiceNow, SAP and Salesforce, Acoustic Campaign, Trello, Microsoft Dynamics 365, Marketo, Email, Sales, Hotmail, Insightly, Asana, Gmail, Jira

NL: Create a Slack translation bot at some point
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Slack

NL: Send me a Slack message
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Slack

NL: Download a PDF attachment from Salesforce
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Salesforce

NL: Invite Sales employees sooner or later
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Sales

NL: Add new Eventbrite attendees to MailChimp lists
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Eventbrite

NL: Copy products from PostgreSQL database to Salesforce
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Salesforce
        
NL: Populate a Salesforce campaign
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Salesforce
        
NL: Extract Salesforce lead details
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Salesforce

NL: Invite Sales employees
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Sales
        
NL: Invite Sales employees to an Eventbrite event
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Eventbrite

NL: Use Slack to notify of unprocessed Kronos leave requests
PATTERN: existence
SYMBOLS: Slack
        
NL: extract Salesforce lead details at least twice
PATTERN: existenceTwo
SYMBOLS: Salesforce
        
NL: notify me through Slack at least twice before an event
PATTERN: existenceTwo
SYMBOLS: Salesforce

NL: remind me twice for the Event
PATTERN: existenceTwo
SYMBOLS: Event
        
NL: Synchronize data between SAP and Salesforce at least twice
PATTERN: existenceTwo
SYMBOLS: SAP and Salesforce

NL: Sync Salesforce new cases at least two times
PATTERN: existenceTwo
SYMBOLS: Salesforce        

NL: every time a response is created in SurveyMonkey, create an object in Amazon S3
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: SurveyMonkey, Amazon S3

NL: always Create a new contact in Acoustic Campaign when a new contact is added in Salesforce
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Acoustic Campaign, Salesforce

NL: Create a new Trello card at some point whenever a new event in Eventbrite is added
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Trello, Eventbrite

NL: eventually Send a Microsoft Teams message whenever a response is created in SurveyMonkey
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Microsoft Teams, SurveyMonkey

NL: eventually Synchronize data between SAP and Salesforce whenever the Salesforce contact is being updated
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: SAP and Salesforce, Salesforce

NL: whenever a response is created in SurveyMonkey, create an object in Amazon S3
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: SurveyMonkey, Amazon S3

NL: for every resolved case in Microsoft Dynamics 365, send a Slack notification
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Microsoft Dynamics 365, Slack

NL: Send a Slack message every time a high or highest priority issue is created in Jira
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Slack, Jira

NL: send a Gmail whenever I get a Slack message
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Gmail, Slack

NL: send me an Email every time I get a Slack message
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Email, Slack

NL: Send a Slack message whenever a response is created in SurveyMonkey
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Slack, SurveyMonkey
        
NL: whenever a new lead is added in Marketo, add a card to a list in Trello sometime after
PATTERN: response
SYMBOLS: Marketo, Trello

NL: every time an Eventbrite is added, notify me via Slack right after
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Eventbrite, Slack

NL: every time there is a new Salesforce campaign, immediately create a new Trello card
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Salesforce, Trello

NL: open a ticket on ServiceNow immediately after receiving an identified issue in Slack
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: ServiceNow, Slack

NL: every time there is a new Salesforce case, create a new Trello card for it right after
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Salesforce, Trello

NL: Send me a Slack notification straight after a new Asana task is created
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Slack, Asana

NL: immediately create a case in Salesforce after a new incident is created in ServiceNow
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Salesforce, ServiceNow

NL: Open a ticket on ServiceNow after receiving an identified issue in Slack
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: ServiceNow, Slack

NL: send me a Slack right after receiving an Hotmail
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Slack, Hotmail

NL: Sync Salesforce data right after a Gmail contact is being updated
PATTERN: chainResponse
SYMBOLS: Salesforce, Gmail

NL: Create a new Trello card for a new Salesforce campaign
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: Trello, Salesforce

NL: if a new Insightly contact is created, then send me a Slack notification
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: Insightly, Slack

NL: if a response is created in SurveyMonkey, then Send a Slack message
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: SurveyMonkey, Slack

NL: make sure that if I receive a Gmail, then either I have already received a Slack message before or I will be receiving it
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: Gmail, Slack

NL: synchronize Salesforce leads either before or after updating the Salesforce account
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: Salesforce, Salesforce

NL: send a Gmail message when a new event is added in Eventbrite
PATTERN: respondedExistence
SYMBOLS: Gmail, Eventbrite
